name: Instance Select
description:
@FORMINSTANCE, @EVENTINSTANCE and $RECORDINSTANCE action tags for unvalidated text fields that enable you to select a specific instance of a repeating form or event for the current record, or another record from the project.

When the data entry or survey page loads, a tagged text field will be replaced with a select list with options for each instance of the specified form / event for the current record, or project records.

action-tags.description: Specify a form name @FORMINSTANCE=myformname or unique event name/form name pair @FORMINSTANCE=myevent_arm_1:myformname and the select list will show instances of the specified form for the current record.
Specify the unique event name @EVENTINSTANCE=myeventname_arm_n and the select list will show instances of the specified event for the current record.
@RECORDINSTANCE : Select a record from the current project.
